subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Billy Wagner, the Mets’ closer, entered the All-Star Game with two outs, no one on base and his team held a one-run lead. He left three batters later with the score tied.
snippet: Billy Wagner, the Mets’ closer, entered the All-Star Game with two outs, no one on base and his team held a one-run lead. He left three batters later with the score tied.
